div.p: Thursday, March 5th, 2020!! Presentation and awards in the PAC at 5 pm followed by pizza dinner in the cafeteria. Bus transportation will be provided to take students home.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020 Winter Athletic Awards

div.p: • MCAS Testing Schedule School Year 2019-2020 Grade 11 & 12 MCAS Spring Retest Dates – Biology Session 1 February 5, 2020 – Biology Session 2 February 6, 2020. ELA Long Composition March 2, 2020, ELA Sessions 1 & 2, March 4, 2020, ELA Session 3 March 5, 2020. Mathematics Session 1 – March 6, 2020, Mathematics Session 2- March 9, 2020. Grade 10 ELA & Math MCAS – ELA Session 1 – March 24, 2020, ELA Session 2 – March 25, 2020. Mathematics Session 1 – May 19, 2020, Mathematics Session 2 – May 20, 2020. Grade 9 & 10 Biology MCAS – Biology Session 1 – June 2, 2020, Biology Session 2 – June 3, 2020

a.title: Go to comments for MCAS Testing Schedule School Year 2019-2020

div.p: Grade 10 ELA MCAS Tutoring Program will be held Tuesday, March 3rd through Thursday, March 19th from 3:00- 4:30pm on Tuesdays and Thursdays.. After school bus is available for transportation home.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020 GRADE 10 ELA MCAS TUTORING

div.p: The MCAS Retest Tutoring Program for the Biology MCAS will be held Thursday, January 16th through Tuesday, February 4th from 3:00- 4:30pm on Tuesdays and Thursdays. The ELA MCAS Retest Tutoring Program will start Thursday, February 6th through Tuesday, March 3rd from 3:00- 4:30pm on Tuesdays and Thursdays. The Math MCAS Retest Tutoring Program will start Tuesday, February 11th through Thursday, March 5th from 3:00- 4:30pm on Tuesdays and Thursdays. After school bus is available for transportation home.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020 MCAS RE-TEST TUTORING

div.p: There are no upcoming events to display.

Greater Lawrence Technical School admits students and makes available to them its advantages, privileges, courses of study and support services without regard to race, color, sex, gender identity, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, disability, homelessness or limited English speaking ability.
